Keywords: Cosmic , Imperial Guard , Ruler , Shi'ar , Soldier
Real Name: Kallark
Special Powers
TARGETING: Destroy Blocking
RELUCTANT MAJESTOR OF THE SHI'AR EMPIRE: Leadership, Mastermind. When Emperor Vulcan uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a XMRF #009 Shi'ar Soldier on click #1. // UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Shi'ar keyword that occupy or are adjacent to 1+ Shi'ar Flag light object modify attack +1.
YOU CAN'T HURT ME BECAUSE I BELIEVE YOU CAN'T HURT ME: When Emperor Gladiator hits, give him a Confidence token [MAX:1]. // If Emperor Gladiator has a Confidence token, he can reduce penetrating damage. // When Emperor Gladiator would take damage, he may instead remove a Confidence token to take no damage.

So....throw him at a heavy hitter that has a few support adjacent. Quake to get rid of the small fry and then take no damage on the next turn when the heavy hitter tries to retaliate (unless he has flurry I guess) then hit the big guy on your turn and rinse and repeat....nice.
